meanings.definition: In two ways or to a double extent.
meanings.sent1: She was doubly happy when she received both gifts.
meanings.sent2: He checked his work doubly to ensure there were no mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The magician waved his wand doubly fast, making the rabbit disappear instantly.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone doubly bright on the day of their wedding.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's praise made her feel doubly proud of her accomplishment.

meanings.sent1: The flowers bloomed doubly beautifully in the spring.
meanings.sent2: He apologized doubly sincerely for his mistake.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed doubly loudly when it wanted attention.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room doubly brightly.
meanings.sent5: The team's effort was doubly rewarded with a victory and a trophy.
